alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:47AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...${headline} will impact portions of southwestern Cook and southeastern Lake Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 147 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Split Rock Lighthouse, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beaver Bay around 150 AM CDT. Silver Bay around 155 AM CDT. Illgen City around 200 AM CDT. Little Marais around 210 AM CDT. Sugar Loaf Cove around 220 AM CDT. Taconite Harbor around 225 AM CDT. Tofte around 230 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Temperance River State Park, George Manitou State Park, Tettegouche State Park and Split Rock Lighthouse State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
